During Pregnancy or Delivery
Can COVID-19 be passed from a pregnant woman to the fetus or
newborn?
We still do not know if a pregnant woman with COVID-19 can pass the virus that causes COVID-
19 to her fetus or baby during pregnancy or delivery. No infants born to mothers with COVID-19
have tested positive for the COVID-19 virus. In these cases, which are a small number, the virus
was not found in samples
